content_warning.title: Content Warning
message: This game references the events of September 11, 2001
at the World Trade Center in a respectful manner.
The game stops at 08:48 and focuses on

plant.examine: A beautiful green plant that looks a bit thirsty.
plant.already_watered: This plant has already been watered today.

papers.already_organized: These papers are already perfectly organized.

printer.examine: The printer is blinking with an error light.
printer.fix: You restart the printer and change the toner.

reception.examine: The reception desk with the time clock system.
reception.check_in: You clock in with your badge.
reception.already_checked: You've already clocked in this morning.

boss_morning: Ah, good morning! Good to see you on time.
I hope you'll have a great day.
Don't hesitate if you have any questions.
alex_morning: Hey! Did you see the state of the printer?
It's acting up again this morning.
If you could take a look, that would be great.
maya_morning: Good morning! Beautiful day isn't it?
I love this view from the upper floors.
Makes you want to work well.
guard_morning: Good morning! Don't forget to clock in at reception.
